description.intro: MIT is a student-run community built to support Muslim students in Hungary, help them connect, grow, and feel at home.
description.activities: We organize events, gatherings, study sessions, charity activities, and spiritual programs ‚Äî all in a positive, respectful, and welcoming environment.

youthLeadership.title: Youth Leadership Workshop
youthLeadership.desc: Empowering young minds ‚ú® Learn leadership, teamwork, public speaking, and more.

communityFootball.title: Community Football Day
communityFootball.desc: Teamwork, vibes, good energy ‚öΩ Bring friends and join local mini-tournaments.

winterCharity.title: Winter Charity Drive
winterCharity.desc: Small acts, big impact ‚ùÑÔ∏è Collect donations for families in need.

ramadanIftar.title: Ramadan Iftar Gathering
ramadanIftar.desc: Breaking fast together üåô Join us for a blessed Iftar meal with the community.

quranStudy.title: Quran Study Circle
quranStudy.desc: Deepen your understanding üìñ Weekly Quran study sessions with scholars and peers.

charityDrive.title: Autumn Charity Drive
charityDrive.desc: Giving back to community üçÇ Collecting essentials for those in need.

testimonials.title: What Our Community Says
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from members who have experienced the warmth and growth of our community

reviews.quote: MIT has been a second home for me. The events are always meaningful, and I've made lifelong friends here. It's amazing to be part of such a supportive community.
reviews.name: Ahmad Hassan
reviews.title: University Student

reviews.quote: The programs organized by MIT helped me connect with my faith while pursuing my studies. The environment is welcoming and the people are genuine.
reviews.name: Fatima Rahman
reviews.title: Medical Student

reviews.quote: I was new to Hungary and felt lost until I found MIT. The community embraced me with open arms and helped me adjust to life here. Forever grateful!
reviews.name: Omar Abdullah
reviews.title: Engineering Student

reviews.quote: The charity drives and community service events taught me the true meaning of giving back. MIT is doing incredible work in bringing people together.
reviews.name: Aisha Khan
reviews.title: Graduate Student

reviews.quote: From football tournaments to study circles, MIT offers something for everyone. It's not just an organization, it's a family that supports your growth.
reviews.name: Yusuf Ahmed
reviews.title: Business Student

joinMIT.title: Join MIT
joinMIT.subtitle: Connect with us and become part of our vibrant community
joinMIT.socialDescription: Follow us on social media to stay updated with our latest events, programs, and community activities.

socialText.facebook: Join our Facebook community for daily updates and discussions
socialText.instagram: Follow our journey through photos and stories
socialText.whatsapp: Join our WhatsApp group for instant updates
socialText.email: Reach out to us directly via email

joinMIT.subscriptionDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter and never miss an event, program, or important announcement.

joinMIT.privacyNote: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime.
joinMIT.callToAction: Join us in building a stronger, more connected community
joinMIT.finalMessage: Together, we create meaningful experiences and lasting bonds that strengthen our faith and community.
